about_the_game:
Talespinner is a deck-building roguelite game that takes place in an exotic and bizarre world of Japanese mythology. As a player, your task is to narrate an exciting story set in this peculiar world.




Every story needs a hero. Pick your protagonist from 3 unique heroes, each with distinct gameplay and their own set of powerful cards. Construct your deck and create powerful synergies.





Decide what adventure your hero will embark on. Are they being pursued by a ninja clan led by the famous Hanzo Hattori? Or perhaps they venture into the mountains to track down the Ice Lady, Yuki Onna, who haunts the local population there?
Every scenario is available with additional story twists, creating even bigger challenge for your hero.








Shape the path of your hero using ideas from your storybook.
Decide not only on the kind of encounters they face but also on their possible modifications that can either make things easier for them or, on the contrary, add some spice making the whole thing much more rewarding.





Immerse yourself in the world of creatures from Japanese mythology. Each yokai comes with its own diverse set of skills making every encounter unique challenge. How to deal with them is up to you. Crush them in decisive combat or make them your allies through charm and cunning.





Confront various hostile forces in battle, which can affect the actions of your hero's cards, enhancing immersion and further increasing the strategic aspect of combat with each opponent.





Take an epic journey through various biomes like bamboo forests, mysterious caves, windy plains, haunted villages, temples and many more. Each biome offers diverse events and as well as unique set of enemies.



  • 3 playable characters with unique mechanics
  • 200+ battle cards
  • 3 different scenarios based on japanese myths additional challenge provided through unlockable story twists for all scenarios
  • 50+ enemies
  • 16 bosess
  • 8 atmospheric biomes
  • 30+ unique random events
  • 50+ strategy enriching companions

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most recent version of Ubuntu LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave (OSX 10.14.X) or later
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Talespinner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 | Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Talespinner is a deck-building roguelike game that takes place in an exotic and bizarre world of Japanese mythology. As a player, your task is to narrate an exciting story set in this peculiar world.
